description: After a routine raid, the rookie sky pirate http://anidb.net/ch4763 [Coud] finds a most unusual cargo in his mates` cargo hold: http://anidb.net/ch4764 [Reverie Metherlance] (or Ren as she prefers to be called), an Edel Reid, a race prized by humans for granting special combat power to their partners through Reacting. He quickly discovers, however, that Ren is even more prized than he expected. The pirate ship is visited by three members of the Edel Reid Complete Protection Agency Arc Aire, who try to purchase her. When Coud refuses, the ship is suddenly attacked by a mysterious force, and Coud`s captain charges him with Ren`s protection.

REGULAR.description:
Coud Van Giruet has plans to be a great sky pirate, but when treasure ends up containing a young girl, he swears to protect her, but who will protect him when he`s in over his head?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La chanson du ciel et du vent
The Songs of the Sky and Wind
บทเพลงแห่งสายลมกับท้องฟ้าสีคราม

REGULAR.description:
The Arc Aile members follow Cou and Ren, on their journey to Edel Garden.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: พันธะสัญญาแห่งโชคชะตา

REGULAR.description:
Ren is kidnapped while everyone is at an inn, and they have to infiltrate Beazon`s castle to save her.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: การหักหลังของต้นไม้แห่งสมบัติทั้ง 7

REGULAR.description:
The gang saves Parl, who offers to help them escape from Beazon, but she seems a bit too helpful...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Elemental Gelade of Light and Darkness
Hikari to Yami no Erementar Gerad
Pierre de lumière et des ténèbres
แก่นศิลาแห่งความมืดและแสงสว่าง
光と闇の核石(エレメンタルジェレイド)

REGULAR.description:
After trouble in a fight against Rig, an old friend of his, Cou asks Cisqua to train him to fight.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: หยาดน้ำตาในวันนั้น
あの日の落涙(ティアドロップ)

REGULAR.description:
Cou tries to ramp up his training while Rowen works a part-time job.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: แววตาที่มองผู้ร่วมทำพันธะสัญญา
同契者(プレジャー)を見つめて

REGULAR.description:
Cou and Rowen repair an airship to aid their journey to Edel Garden, but assassins target Rowen and Kuea, believing them to be Cou and Ren.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: การตัดสินใจของโรเว่น
併唱謳(オブリガーズ)への決意

REGULAR.description:
The group comes across Serena, another Edel Raid, who escaped from Arc Aile, and is currently being hunted by an Edel Raid hunter.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: อีดิลเรดฮันเตอร์ผู้น่าสะพรึงกลัว
戦慄の煌珠狩者[エディルレイドハンター]

REGULAR.description:
Ren saves a girl named Lillia but is mistaken as a kidnapper by her sister Rasati. Meanwhile, the Arc Aile trio infiltrates illegal fights.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ความลับที่เมืองราซเฟ
港町(ラズフェ=アンクル)の秘密

REGULAR.description:
Thugs try to grab Lillia again, and Cou finds out about a job fighting underground, which he and Ren decide to enter.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: สังเวียนแห่งความรักและความละโมบ
愛と欲望の賭闘場[ミリアルド=トレイ]

REGULAR.description:
Cou and Ren`s next opponent in the fights is Rasati, who is fighting to buy her and Lillia`s freedom.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ความโกรธแค้นของนักสู้แห่งการเดิมพัน
復讐の賭闘士[クラスファイター]

REGULAR.description:
Rasati chases after Marl, revealed as the enslaver of her and her sister, as a larger group from Arc Aile show up to help...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: วิ่งสู่อิสรภาพ

REGULAR.description:
Ren wakes up in Edel Garden, but things don`t seem to make sense.  Meanwhile, Cou tries to find Ren.
Source: crunchyroll

Cou goes after Ren, but he isn`t the only one looking, as he finds out when he runs into Wolx and Tilel.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ปะทะอีดิลเรดฮันเตอร์อีกครั้ง
煌珠狩者(エディルレイドハンター), 再臨

REGULAR.description:
Ren finds herself in a city with a windmill blocked by a large wall, with a young boy desperately trying to destroy the wall.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Village with the Large Windmill
เอเร บลังก้า
大風車の村(エレ=ブランカ)

REGULAR.description:
The group takes a boat trip to where they will finally find Edel Garden, but things take a turn for the weird with strange music playing and a poisoned Cou acting enraged.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: บทเพลงอันแสนเศร้า
追憶の銃弾(ワイルドブリッド)

REGULAR.description:
A girl named Viro joins the team so they can escort her home, and Ren has to deal with jealousy over the attention she is giving Cou.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: การพบกันที่แสนอลหม่าน

REGULAR.description:
Cou and Viro defeat Marl, but Viro knows she isn`t trusted by the group... and she has a plan to fix that.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: พันธะสัญญาจอมปลอม

REGULAR.description:
The girls go swimming while Cou repairs the van, and Viro and Ren discuss their feelings.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ความปรารถนาของก้อนหิน

REGULAR.description:
Viro has been promised her dream if she kills Cou, but can she do it?
Source: crunchyroll

Talking shelter when Ren is ill, Chaos Choir launches a full scale assault on Cou and friends.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ความเป็นจริงที่ถูกเปิดเผย

REGULAR.description:
Arc Aile stops the attack from Chaos Choir and Cisqua finds out more about Edel Garden.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ตำนานที่ถูกฝัง

REGULAR.description:
If Ren becomes the queen of Chaos Choir, they promise to end the war with Arc Aile.
Source: crunchyroll

Ren`s friends fight to free her from her fate, but will Cou make it to her?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: อีดิลการ์เด้น
煌珠楽園(エディルガーデン)

REGULAR.description:
Ren is queen and Cou is dead. But the prior queen of Edel Garden has a miracle up her sleeve.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: คาออสไควเออร์
混沌の礼賛謳(カオスクァイア)

Cou won`t give up on saving Ren despite Chaos Choir having control of her in the final battle.
